snippet: Leicester City became the first reigning Premier League champions to begin their title defence with a defeat when they were beaten 2-1 at promoted Hull City, who shrugged off an injury crisis to cause an upset on the opening day of the new season ...

headline.main: Champions Leicester Stunned by Hull in Premier League Opener
headline.print_headline: Champions Leicester Stunned by Hull in Premier League Opener

lead_paragraph: Leicester City became the first reigning Premier League champions to begin their title defence with a defeat when they were beaten 2-1 at promoted Hull City, who shrugged off an injury crisis to cause an upset on the opening day of the new season on Saturday.

snippet: Premier League's "diabolical" fixtures are devaluing the FA Cup by forcing managers to field weakened teams in the knockout competition, Sunderland boss Sam Allardyce has said....

headline.main: 'Diabolical' Premier League Fixture Devaluing FA Cup-Allardyce
headline.print_headline: 'Diabolical' Premier League Fixture Devaluing FA Cup-Allardyce

lead_paragraph: Premier League's "diabolical" fixtures are devaluing the FA Cup by forcing managers to field weakened teams in the knockout competition, Sunderland boss Sam Allardyce has said.

snippet: Welcome to the Premier League, Bob Bradley....

headline.main: Bradley Makes Losing Start to Life in Premier League
headline.print_headline: Bradley Makes Losing Start to Life in Premier League

lead_paragraph: Welcome to the Premier League, Bob Bradley.

snippet: Liverpool coach Juergen Klopp advised Ilkay Guendogan to move to the Premier League this season, saying the playing style in England's top division suited the creative midfielder, the Manchester City player said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Klopp Advised Guendogan to Move to Premier League
headline.print_headline: Klopp Advised Guendogan to Move to Premier League

lead_paragraph: Liverpool coach Juergen Klopp advised Ilkay Guendogan to move to the Premier League this season, saying the playing style in England's top division suited the creative midfielder, the Manchester City player said on Tuesday.

snippet: Glasgow Rangers ended their four-year exile from the Scottish Premier League with a disappointing 1-1 draw against Hamilton Academical at Ibrox on Saturday....

headline.main: Rangers Rescue Draw on Scottish Premier League Return
headline.print_headline: Rangers Rescue Draw on Scottish Premier League Return

lead_paragraph: Glasgow Rangers ended their four-year exile from the Scottish Premier League with a disappointing 1-1 draw against Hamilton Academical at Ibrox on Saturday.

snippet: Finger-jabbing players aggressively challenging referees. Rival teams in mass brawls. Touchline confrontations between managers....

headline.main: Premier League Says Players' Bad Behavior Damaging Its Image
headline.print_headline: Premier League Says Players' Bad Behavior Damaging Its Image

lead_paragraph: Finger-jabbing players aggressively challenging referees. Rival teams in mass brawls. Touchline confrontations between managers.

snippet: England's top flight football clubs have agreed to cap the price of tickets for away fans at 30 pounds for the next three seasons, the Premier League said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Premier League Clubs Cap Away Tickets at 30 Pounds
headline.print_headline: Premier League Clubs Cap Away Tickets at 30 Pounds

lead_paragraph: England's top flight football clubs have agreed to cap the price of tickets for away fans at 30 pounds for the next three seasons, the Premier League said on Wednesday.

snippet: Manchester United striker Wayne Rooney rose to second place on the all-time Premier League scoring list with a clever winner against Swansea City on Saturday....

headline.main: Premier League Milestone as Rooney Ends Goal Drought
headline.print_headline: Premier League Milestone as Rooney Ends Goal Drought

lead_paragraph: Manchester United striker Wayne Rooney rose to second place on the all-time Premier League scoring list with a clever winner against Swansea City on Saturday.

snippet: The final round of international fixtures in 2016 did no favors for managers of some of the English Premier League's title hopefuls....

headline.main: Premier League Managers Counting Cost of International Games
headline.print_headline: Premier League Managers Counting Cost of International Games

lead_paragraph: The final round of international fixtures in 2016 did no favors for managers of some of the English Premier League's title hopefuls.

snippet: Records tumbled in the transfer window as Premier League spending totalled 1.165 billion pounds ($1.54 billion),  financial analyst Deloitte's Sports Business Group said on Thursday....

headline.main: Premier League Outlay Tops $1.5 Billion in Window
headline.print_headline: Premier League Outlay Tops $1.5 Billion in Window

lead_paragraph: Records tumbled in the transfer window as Premier League spending totalled 1.165 billion pounds ($1.54 billion),  financial analyst Deloitte's Sports Business Group said on Thursday.
